==Japanese==

===Etymology===
/rikizimapi<sub>1</sub>/ > /rikizimaɸi/ > */rikizimawi/ > /rikizimai/ {{IPAchar|[rikidʑimai]}}. Originally from {{etyl|zh|ja|sort=りきじまい}} 力士 /likdzri/ + {{etyl|ja|-}} 舞 /mapi/.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りきじまい|hhira=りきじまひ}}
